titleStmt.title: An epistle to all Christians, Jews, and Gentiles shewing how that God dwells not in their temples made with hands.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Bringhurst, printer and stationer, at the sign of the Book in Grace-Church-Street, near Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.

place.placeName: the sign of the Book in Grace-Church-Street, near Cornhil
